dcterms:description: A dataset created by extracting dialogues about football from the OpenSubtitles dataset, used to train a social chatbot called Chatbol.

dcterms:description: A dataset used for training a chatbot aimed at elderly care.

dcterms:creator: Guido Tascini
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of conversations from the Ubuntu corpus, Microsoft Research Social Media Conversation corpus, and Cornell Movie Dialog corpus used to train a chatbot for the elderly.
dcterms:title: Ubuntu corpus

dcterms:creator: Guido Tascini
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of conversations from the Microsoft Research Social Media Conversation corpus used to train a chatbot for the elderly.
dcterms:title: Microsoft Research Social Media Conversation corpus

dcterms:creator: Guido Tascini
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of the Cornell Movie Dialog corpus used to train a chatbot for the elderly.

dcterms:description: A dataset used to build a dialogue system for Vietnamese using seq2seq and LSTM models.
